abstract: The Drudge Report isn’t for sale — at least, not that we know of. But that didn’t stop Duff McDonald, writing in the latest issue of Portfolio magazine, from playfully speculating about the value of Matt Drudge’s Web site, a gossipy gathering of links, news and scoops that has been around for more than a decade and can still make waves in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The Drudge Report isn’t for sale — at least, not that we know of. But that didn’t stop Duff McDonald, writing in the latest issue of Portfolio magazine, from playfully speculating about the value of Matt Drudge’s Web site, a gossipy gathering of links, news and scoops that has been around for more than a decade and can still make waves in Washington.

headline.main: Putting a Price on the Drudge Report
